Replies.Author: Jack
Replies.Content:
Even though I had my ass handed to me in the Heavy tournament, it was a ton of fun to get on a pad for the first time in years.

Free Play at the end was great, too. Especially the troll ‚Äúsongs‚Äù like Powerthirst or Technologic. Oh, and the anime songs we had to play to confirm our status as the anime club, too (Gene won, though, when he Hare Hare Yukai‚Äôd on command).

Looking forward to the next throwdown and/or DDR club next year!

Replies.Author: Gene
Replies.Content:
Yeah, sorry I‚Äôm a bad cameraman, I liked talking more üôÇ

Anyway, the videos look great, and I was also pleased with the turnout. Of course, that sets a pretty high bar for the next tournament. Hope the next one does better!

Replies.Author: Daniel Pascua
Replies.Content: I realized I never told you how to zoom in, but I think the videos were all right anyway. Maybe people will find the conversations interesting to listen to. üòâ

Replies.Author: Grant Walker
Replies.Content:
I was surprised how many people were there that weren‚Äôt in the club. Most of them were competent, though, which makes a lot of sense.

It was awesome, though, even for a casual like me. Looking forward to the next one!
